title: Pink Velvet Murder
description: *This is book 9 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   When a disgruntled student is suspected of killing her own Home Economics teacher after losing a baking competition, it is up to Missy to learn the truth. Her alternative theory produces a second suspect who tries to ingratiate himself, but only sets off louder alarms. Will the facts lead to the right answer, or will the Baking Killer escape?  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1zyu5vx Book 2: http://amzn.to/1F4EZvi Book 3: http://amzn.to/1Eq21qR Book 4: http://amzn.to/1L0JO7m Book 5: http://amzn.to/1BlRwDY Book 6: http://amzn.to/1Jt6HBP Book 7: http://amzn.to/1B5eAfF Book 8: http://amzn.to/1GftATX   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Carol Durand
